scripts.start:dev-doctor: npm run build && npx clinic doctor --name playwright -- node dist/src/index.js
scripts.start:dev-flame: npm run build && npx clinic flame --name playwright -- node dist/src/index.js
scripts.test:e2e-flame: concurrently -k -s all -n "gateway,playwright" -c "magenta,blue" "npm run start:dev-flame" "wait-on 'tcp:$PORT' && npm run test:e2e"
scripts.test:e2e-doctor: concurrently -k -s all -n "gateway,playwright" -c "magenta,blue" "npm run start:dev-doctor" "wait-on 'tcp:$PORT' && npm run test:e2e"
scripts.test:gwc-helia: npm run build && USE_LIBP2P=false USE_BITSWAP=false PORT=8090 TRUSTLESS_GATEWAYS='http://127.0.0.1:8080' FILE_DATASTORE_PATH=./data/datastore FILE_BLOCKSTORE_PATH=./data/blockstore DEBUG='helia-http-gateway*' ECHO_HEADERS='true' npm start
scripts.test:gwc-setup: concurrently -k -s all -n "kubo,helia" -c "magenta,blue" "npm run test:gwc-kubo" "wait-on 'tcp:8080' && npm run test:gwc-helia"
scripts.test:gwc-execute: docker run --network host -v $PWD:/workspace -w /workspace ghcr.io/ipfs/gateway-conformance:v0.4.2 test --gateway-url='http://127.0.0.1:8090' --subdomain-url='http://helia-http-gateway.localhost' --verbose --json gwc-report.json --specs subdomain-ipns-gateway,subdomain-ipfs-gateway -- -timeout 30m
scripts.test:gwc: concurrently -k -s all -n "kubo&helia,gateway-conformance" -c "magenta,blue" "npm run test:gwc-setup" "wait-on 'tcp:8090' && npm run test:gwc-execute"
